name: Sense Poisons And Drugs
effect: The mage can sense the presence of poisons and drugs in liquid, solid, or gaseous matter. He might not know the name of a specific substance but immediately understands what effects it would have in the human body. His senses extend to substances that have been adulterated by a poison or drug, so he can detect a drugged drink or poisoned food. Even if a substance is not a poison or drug per se, he understands at a glance what effects the substance would have if inhaled, ingested, or introduced into the bloodstream.A mage with Matter 2 and Life 2 can extend this spell's benefits to another person.

rotes.roteDescription: The Militant Auditing cult uses this rote to detect attempts by so-called suppressive persons to drug or poison cult members. The cult is paranoid by policy and requires members to use the rote on everything from restaurant takeout to hotel rooms.
